name: Pro Tennis: World Court
overview: Pro Tennis: World Court is a tennis game, it's an update of Namco’s 1987 game Family Tennis for the Famicom. The game features twenty different players (ten male, eight female and two robot) and three courts - New York (hard), London (lawn) and Paris (clay). You can either play Singles match (Player 1 versus the AI or against Player 2) or Doubles (Player Team versus Computer Team). The arcade version supports 2 players.
